metadata.name: Smile or Die: Molotov
metadata.description:
Smile or Die: Molotov

Smile or Die is an artistic satire against toxic positivism. A series of moving paintings that fight against the dangerous and exacerbated toxic positivism that reigns in today's society, in constant pursuit of happiness.

Smile or Die focuses on clich√© phrases that blame the cosmos or fate, removing responsibility, capabilities or the context of the person from the equation. Toxic positivism is contraindicated for human beings, as it has direct consequences on their mental health.  
With Smile or die, Zigor intends to put the focus on these dangers, inviting the observer to reflect and to eliminate filters in life and in social networks.  
Through this work Zigor wants to vindicate the right to be and to be a sad, angry, bitter and stale person.

Molotov is part of the exhibition and auction Sotheby's Metaverse Paris.
